title: ITC Novarese used where?
content:
I'm currently working on a 30 second motion sequence that has to capture the personality, characteristics etc of a typeface/font family. My typeface family is ITC Novarese.

While I seem to have the font anatomy, origins and characteristics down pat, I am lacking any examples of where it has been used (advertising, magazine work etc). Does anyone know of any examples, brands, advertisements, buildings, etc that make good use of this font family?

Thanks!
author: ex_reven

comments.content:
[Flickr is an obvious place to start.](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201110501/http:/www.flickr.com/search/?w=all&q=+type%3Aface%3Dnovarese&m=text "face=novarese")

—  
Joe Clark  
 [http://joeclark.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201110501/http:/joeclark.org/ "http://joeclark.org/")

Thanks for the replies.  
Do you like Novarese? Im having a hard time making it useful.  
What do you think?
